api.graphics

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.graphics.SpriteManager
      • api.graphics.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Animation
extends SpriteManager
implements Drawable
    This class is an extension of SpriteManager that holds a set of Sprites that can be cycled between for the purpose of animation creations. The animations can be individually stepped frame for frame or set to run automatically or loop. Animation will always have an active Sprite that will be drawn when the inheritted draw method is called. The drawable interface means this class can be held in a SpriteManager.
    Version:
    July 26th, 2015
    Author:
    Jonathan Zwiebel
